settings.heading: I started knitting in 2018 after asking my Granny to teach me. Long story short,  I haven't put my needles (& crochet hook) down since

settings.text: I sell custom beanies, homeware and chunky jumpers. I also take on custom orders and mend damaged knits. I am a strong believer in the slow fashion movement and would love to convince people to move away from fast fashion, support small businesses (like mine) and own clothes and wear them for longer and restyle them as the fashions change
